articles.title: Measles outbreak claims six lives in K-P
articles.content: The measles outbreak across Khyber Pakhtunkhwa has claimed the lives of six children this year. A total of 1,236 confirmed cases have been reported from different parts of the province in response to which the Khyber Pakhtunkhwa Expanded Program on I... [2830 chars]

articles.title: Murad urges sticking to Constitution on NFC
articles.description: Sindh CM says provincial share cannot be reduced
articles.content:
Sindh Chief Minister Murad Ali Shah on Saturday said that the provinces’ share in the next NFC award would be granted as per the constitutional provisions.
“It is written in the Constitution about the NFC award that the provinces’ share [in the divis... [2812 chars]

articles.title: Gas becomes a rarity in Ramazan
articles.description: Residents of all major cities have to rely on exorbitantly priced LPG cylinders given the load shedding
articles.content: Despite provincial governments making promises of uninterrupted gas supply to household users during the month of Ramazan, gas has become a rarity in the Holy Month, which has led to residents relying on liquefied petroleum gas (LPG) cylinders; resul... [3368 chars]

articles.title: Sidhu Moosewala’s parents welcome baby boy; See pic here
articles.description: Balkaur Singh, father of late singer Sidhu Moosewala, announces the arrival of their newborn son, thanking well-wishers and expressing gratitude for the family's health.
articles.content: Balkaur Singh, father of late singer Sidhu Moosewala has announced the arrival of their newborn son. “With the blessings of lakhs and crores of souls desiring Shubhdeep, the Eternal Lord has put Shubh's little brother in our lap. Thanks to the blessi... [1241 chars]

articles.title: Kate Middleton Could Share Health Struggles, Report Says
articles.description: Friends and sources close to Kensington Palace told The Times of London that Kate Middleton may soon share why she received abdominal surgery.
articles.content:
Kate Middleton is expected to resume her duties after her children return to school in April.
Her friends told The Times of London that she may also disclose why she received abdominal surgery.
Middleton's disappearance from public life resulted in c... [2883 chars]

articles.title: Germany calls for large-scale aid access to Gaza as Scholz heads to Israel
articles.description: BERLIN: German Chancellor Olaf Scholz urged Israel on Saturday to allow humanitarian aid access to Gaza on a larger scale, ahead of a two-day trip to the Middle East. Scholz will travel to the Jordanian Red Sea port of Aqaba on Saturday to meet on Sunday with Jordan’s King Abdullah before flying on to Israel to meet with Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu. “It is necessary for
articles.content:
Israel to attend new ceasefire talks as UN says Gaza hunger crisis worsens

articles.content:
Illustration by Radia Durrani

articles.title: HBL PSL 2024: Imad, Haider power Islamabad United into final
articles.description: Both batters hit half-centuries after Islamabad, chasing 186, had found themselves reeling at 91-5.
articles.content:
KARACHI: Imad Wasim and Haider Ali starred with counterpunching efforts against Peshawar Zalmi in the second Eliminator here at the National Bank Stadium on Saturday to take Islamabad United to their third HBL Pakistan Super League final.

articles.title: Ukrainian strikes set oil refinery ablaze, kill two in Belgorod
articles.description: Moscow accuses Kyiv of stepping up "terror attacks" to disrupt presidential elections.
articles.content:
MOSCOW: A Ukrainian missile attack killed two people in western Russia, and a separate drone strike set an oil refinery ablaze on Saturday, the second day of an election that President Vladimir Putin has accused Kyiv of trying to disrupt.
